creditline: Gift of Richard Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: red ground with blue and white narrow ikat stripes with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning at each end and in the middle, unwoven warp-end fringe.
medium: Cotton, rayon; warp faced ikat with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning
title: Man's Sash (banda)
